DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to obtain imaging biomarkers based on changes in activity patterns and changes in brain connectivity obtained with the analysis of functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) and tractography that are related to chronic pelvic pain
DOC.brief_title: Effects of an Intervention Program Based on Pain Education in Patients With Chronic Pelvic Pain
